server_error_bandwidth_order: An error has occurred ordering bandwidth: {{error}}
server_order_bandwidth_not_available: No type of bandwidth can be ordered on the {{t0}} server
server_order_bandwidth_help: The Premium, Platinum and Ultimate solutions guarantee high-quality bandwidth in a geographical zone that is as close as possible to your customers.
server_order_bandwidth_ready: Your order is ready. Depending on when payment is processed, the bandwidth should be available shortly.
server_order_bandwidth_empty_plans: Unable to find plans to upgrade
server_order_bandwidth_declaration: Your option’s renewal date will be aligned with your server’s renewal date. The amount displayed corresponds to your option’s first billing month, calculated on a pro rata basis for the current month.
server_order_bandwidth_info: The amount displayed is the total that will be billed on your option’s next renewal date.
server_order_bandwidth_warning: Your bandwidth will be modified a few minutes after you have enabled the option.
